effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

name: Irradiated Undercoat

spells.description: Equip: Chance on hit to draw Unstable Isotopes from any Irradiated Elemental or Contaminated Glob.

Use: Absorb 100 Unstable Isotopes, increasing threat generation by 20%, Nature damage taken by 5%, and periodically heals the caster for 1% to 5% per 6 sec for 30 min.

Only usable on Mechagon Island. (1 Day Cooldown)

description: The metal links have a slight green glow to them. Wearing it cannot possibly be good for you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your damaging abilities have a very high chance to charge the magnet, up to 30 times.

Use: Reverse the magnet's polarity to violently recycle buried garbage, dealing 68,589 Plague damage to your target per charge. Lingering virulence deals 10% of the damage dealt to 5 nearby enemies over 6 sec. (20 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Fierce Gladiator's Ironskin Cloak

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Stormwind.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
